hero.title: Experience Sacred Vedic Traditions
hero.subtitle: Connect with authentic priests for all your spiritual needs

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich traditions of Vedic culture. Our platform connects you with experienced priests who perform authentic rituals and ceremonies.
about.vision: Our vision is to make Vedic services accessible to everyone while maintaining their sacred authenticity.

services.title: Our Services
services.hawansDesc: Sacred fire ceremonies for purification and spiritual elevation
services.weddingsDesc: Traditional Vedic marriage ceremonies and pre-wedding rituals
services.bhajansDesc: Devotional songs and spiritual music sessions
services.shantiPoojaDesc: Peace-invoking ceremonies for harmony and well-being
